text: - [Narrator] Amazon Q Developer
is a new Generative AI powered assistant
that can complete tasks for you

or help you learn how
to start something new

all from a single prompt
in your favorite IDE.

For example, we can ask
Q to refactor our code.

Q analyzes the code across
our entire code base

and comes up with a plan
to clean up redundant code
to improve code efficiency.
The plan provides a detailed explanation
of the changes Q is suggesting.

We can also iterate until
Q has the right plan
for our use case.
It will then generate the updated code
along with the necessary test.

We can click on each file to
review the proposed changes.
Finally, we can merge the new code
into our project with one click.

Install Amazon Q Developer
in your favorite IDE
and accelerate code refactoring today.
